mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hm_erp_service_venue_link ( service_venue_id, link_id, link_type, company_id )( SELECT service_venue.id, venue_room.room_id, venue_room.room_type, venue_room.company_id FROM hm_erp_service_venue service_venue LEFT JOIN hm_erp_venue_room venue_room ON service_venue.venue_id = venue_room.venue_id AND service_venue.company_id = venue_room.company_id WHERE ( venue_room.room_id IN (${shootRoomIds}) or venue_room.room_id IN (${makeupRoomIds}) ) AND service_venue.company_id = #{companyId} and service_venue.service_id=#{serviceId} )
mapper.delete: delete from hm_erp_service_venue where service_id=#{serviceId} and company_id=#{companyId}
delete from hm_erp_service_venue_link where service_venue_id in (select id from hm_erp_service_venue where service_id=#{serviceId}) and company_id=#{companyId}
mapper.select: SELECT service.id id, service.service_name serviceName, service.service_type serviceType, service.shoot_num shootNum, service.makeup_num makeupNum, service.video_num videoNum, service_status serviceStatus, concat( ( SELECT count(1) FROM hm_erp_service a LEFT JOIN hm_erp_service_venue b ON a.company_id = b.company_id AND a.id = b.service_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_service_venue_link c ON b.company_id = c.company_id AND c.service_venue_id = b.id WHERE c.service_venue_id IS NOT NULL AND a.id = service.id AND c.link_type = 1 ), '/', ( SELECT count(1) FROM hm_erp_venue_room a WHERE a.venue_id IN ( SELECT c.venue_id FROM hm_erp_service b LEFT JOIN hm_erp_service_venue c ON b.company_id = c.company_id AND b.id = c.service_id WHERE b.id = service.id ) AND a.room_type = 1 ) )as makeupRoomNum, concat( ( SELECT count(1) FROM hm_erp_service a LEFT JOIN hm_erp_service_venue b ON a.company_id = b.company_id AND a.id = b.service_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_service_venue_link c ON b.company_id = c.company_id AND c.service_venue_id = b.id WHERE c.service_venue_id IS NOT NULL AND a.id = service.id AND c.link_type = 2 ), '/', ( SELECT count(1) FROM hm_erp_venue_room a WHERE a.venue_id IN ( SELECT c.venue_id FROM hm_erp_service b LEFT JOIN hm_erp_service_venue c ON b.company_id = c.company_id AND b.id = c.service_id WHERE b.id = service.id ) AND a.room_type = 2 ) ) as shootRoomNum, GROUP_CONCAT( venue.venue_name SEPARATOR ',' ) venueName, GROUP_CONCAT( venue.id SEPARATOR ',' ) venueIds FROM hm_erp_service service LEFT JOIN hm_erp_service_venue service_venue ON service_venue.company_id = service.company_id AND service_venue.service_id = service.id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_venue venue ON venue.company_id = service.company_id AND venue.id = service_venue.venue_id where service.company_id=#{companyId} GROUP BY service.id

SELECT service.id serviceId, concat(service_venue.venue_id,"-",service_venue_link.link_id) roomId, room.room_name roomName, room.room_type roomType FROM hm_erp_service service LEFT JOIN hm_erp_service_venue service_venue ON service_venue.company_id = service.company_id AND service_venue.service_id = service.id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_service_venue_link service_venue_link ON service_venue.id = service_venue_link.service_venue_id AND service_venue.company_id = service_venue_link.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_venue_room room ON room.room_id = service_venue_link.link_id AND room.company_id = service_venue_link.company_id WHERE room_id IS NOT NULL AND service.company_id = #{companyId}
select service_name from hm_erp_service where service_name=#{serviceName} and company_id=#{companyId}

SELECT service_venue.service_id, service.service_name, service_venue.venue_id, venue.venue_name, venue.venue_status FROM hm_erp_service_venue service_venue LEFT JOIN hm_erp_service service ON service.id = service_venue.service_id AND service.company_id = service_venue.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_venue venue ON service_venue.venue_id = venue.id AND service_venue.company_id = venue.company_id WHERE service_venue.company_id = #{companyId}

select service.id,service.service_name,service.service_type,service_venue.venue_id ,venue.venue_name,venue.venue_status FROM hm_erp_service service LEFT JOIN hm_erp_service_venue service_venue ON service_venue.company_id = service.company_id AND service_venue.service_id = service.id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_venue venue on venue.company_id = service_venue.company_id and venue.id = service_venue.venue_id where service.company_id = #{companyId}
and service_venue.venue_id = #{venueId}

SELECT service.id serviceId, room.room_id, room.room_name roomName, room.room_type roomType FROM hm_erp_service service LEFT JOIN hm_erp_service_venue service_venue ON service_venue.company_id = service.company_id AND service_venue.service_id = service.id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_service_venue_link service_venue_link ON service_venue.id = service_venue_link.service_venue_id AND service_venue.company_id = service_venue_link.company_id LEFT JOIN hm_erp_venue_room room ON room.room_id = service_venue_link.link_id AND room.company_id = service_venue_link.company_id WHERE service.company_id = #{companyId} and room.room_type = #{roomType}
and service_venue.venue_id = #{venueId}
